name: Dino Day
description:
Hi, I'm heyblindmouse and this is my first ever game! It's also my first ever gamejam, too! >3< I learned a lot, and have a lot of improving to go but I'm proud of this dino baby! 

I have low-vision / legally blind, and made this over the course of several weeks, lots of breaks, and without glasses lmao. My nose was glued to the monitor, ayyyyy.

It's a short and sweet little game about a dino family and CRUSHING CARS.

A big thank you to husband and friends who cheered me along the way, I wasn't gonna upload my first game to a gamejam but it felt like the stars aligned.

Engine: Gdevelop
Art: made by me, using Piskel
Sounds: made by me, using BFXR and Famistudio
